Root Cause: Unhandled exception causing 500 Internal Server Error at /api/data.

Possible Causes: Application code error in the /api/data endpoint.
Missing or incorrect dependencies required by the endpoint.

Detailed Root Cause Analysis.Observations: The server returned a 500 error, indicating an internal issue when processing the request.
Detailed Root Cause Analysis.Impact: Users cannot access the /api/data endpoint, affecting functionality.
Detailed Root Cause Analysis.Correlations: This could be related to recent code changes or server updates.

Explanation.Conclusion: An unhandled exception in the application code is the most likely cause of the 500 error.
